review: Works as discribed, I didn't like that you have to pay for all the apps to use, on TV commercial they make it sound like just plug and play not so. I returned for credit.
author: ricdic

review: this product is we below my expectations.I thought it would really be plug-and-play and cast everything from my portable devices to TV.It cannot cast even HD streams from youtube smoothly!I am totally unsatisfied and back to my old HDMI cable.
author: Mahdi N.
